overview: Theodore D. Greene has more than 18 years of leadership experience in building successful operations and growing companies. An accomplished entrepreneur and corporate strategist, Mr. Greene brings to Old Willow Partners the financial and managerial experience required to assist portfolio companies in their rapid growth. Mr. Greene currently serves as CEO of Rainbo Sports, LLC., the leading multi-channel retailer in the competitive figure skating industry. Under his leadership, Rainbo Sports has successfully launched a mobile retail channel, online community platform and moved the company from a strong specialty retailer into a lifestyle company for young female athletes.
